places_to_visit.name: Petra
places_to_visit.description: Petra is an ancient city carved into the sandstone cliffs of southern Jordan. Known as the Rose City for its pink-hued rocks, it was the capital of the Nabataean Kingdom and is famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system. Highlights include the Treasury, the Monastery, and the Roman Theater.

places_to_visit.name: Wadi Rum
places_to_visit.description: Wadi Rum, also known as the Valley of the Moon, is a protected desert wilderness in southern Jordan. It's known for its stunning sandstone mountains, unique rock formations, and historical significance as a backdrop in many films.

places_to_visit.name: Amman
places_to_visit.description: Amman, the capital of Jordan, is a city with a rich history and modern culture. Key attractions include the Citadel, Roman Theater, and the Jordan Museum.
